mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAYMENT_HISTORY ( PAYMENT_NO, PAYMENT_USER_EMAIL, PAYMENT_DATE, PAYMENT_AMOUNT, PAYMENT_METHOD, PAYMENT_STATE, PAYMENT_PRODUCT, PAYMENT_REFERENCE ) VALUES ( #{paymentNo}, #{paymentUserEmail}, SYSDATE, #{paymentAmount}, #{paymentMethod}, #{paymentState}, #{paymentProduct}, null )
mapper.select: SELECT PAYMENT_NO, PAYMENT_DATE, PAYMENT_STATE, PAYMENT_METHOD, PAYMENT_AMOUNT, PAYMENT_PRODUCT FROM PAYMENT_HISTORY WHERE PAYMENT_USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail} AND PAYMENT_STATE != 'Pending' ORDER BY PAYMENT_DATE DESC
SELECT * FROM PAYMENT_HISTORY WHERE PAYMENT_STATE = 'Pending' AND PAYMENT_DATE < #{limitMinute}
